item.title: SRCDS Server Restarter Script
item.description: The script uses the Net::SRCDS::Queries Perl module by Author MASANORIH to communicate with the SRCDS servers. It checks if the servers responds to Source Server Queries, when the server does not respond to the queries, the script considers the server as unreachable/offline. When the server is considered unreachable/offline, the script uses normal bash commands to write a line with unreachable into a file. After the script wrote the line to the file it checks how many lines with unreachable have been written to the file.
